text: geudeul-eul buleul ttaeneun geuleul nah-eun abeojiui ileum-eulo buleula geugeos-ihananim bosigie jeong-uiloun geos-ilageuleona neohuiga geuleul nah-eun abeoji ileum-eul moleul gyeong-ueneun mid-eum-eul ga jin geuui hyeongje ttoneun bohojaui ileum-eulo buleula silsuhan geos-eun neohuie ge joega anina neohui ma-eum-i uidojeog-ieossdamyeon neohuiga joein-ila sil lo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungman hasim-ila
